Entry.JapaneseText: うーん、人助けした後ってのは、 なんとも気持ちのいいもんだよなあ。
Entry.EnglishText: Yep, that feeling you get after helping others sure does feel good.

Entry.JapaneseText: それにしても、サレやトーマのやり方に反対しただけで 牢屋に入れられるなんて気の毒だネ。
Entry.EnglishText: Still, it's awful that they were imprisoned all because they opposed Saleh and Tohma's methods.

Entry.JapaneseText: 言いたい事も言えないというわけか…… それも陛下のご意向に添う事なのか……
Entry.EnglishText: I wonder if people being unable to speak their minds is in accordance with Her Majesty's wishes...

Entry.JapaneseText: 何にせよ、サレやトーマを許してるって事だよな。 本当にムチャクチャだぜ……
Entry.EnglishText: In any case, she lets Saleh and Tohma get away with it. That's really messed up...
